DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study to describe the long term use of Onabotulinumtoxin A (BOTOX®) as prescribed by the physician for headache prophylaxis in adults with chronic migraine. All treatment decisions lie with the physician.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of BOTOX® as Headache Prophylaxis for Chronic Migraine
DOC.criteria: Prescribed BOTOX® for the prophylaxis of headaches Received treatment with any botulinum toxin Type A serotype in the last 26 weeks Current participation in Allergan's Botox Chronic Migraine PostAuthorisation Safety Study (protocol 191622110)
